QuestData.Title: Peace by Piece
QuestData.Description:
These Maldraxxi fiends have reoccupied my temple. They have entrenched this resurgence with shields powered by necromancy.
My disciples--the ones who were not captured and executed by your treacherous compatriots--report the core of a necrotic bulwark to the south. We cannot counter their forces until the shield is brought down.
See it done. I will not tolerate your presence otherwise.
QuestData.LogDescription: Disable the Necrotic Bulwark in the South.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet the Paragon of Courage at the temple precipice.
